name: Camacho - Scorpion Connecticut - Gordo
additionalNotes: Handmade in Honduras and featuring a gorgeous Ecuadorian Connecticut wrapper leaf, Scorpion Connecticut is as smooth as it is flavorful. Offered up in two different wrappers, today we’re focused on the Connecticut release.  Its signature scorpion has become a very sought out cigar to anyone who enjoys this brand’s unmatched blends. Camacho’s statement is palpable every time you smoke an Scorpion cigar— created to embody the brand’s unmistakable spirit, without carrying the hefty price point.
